thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 91 of 7354
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
Have been buying from B&H since the early 1980's. They have always had equipment and/or supplies I needed for my photo business, and rarely have they been out of stock. Their prices are excellent, often with free shipping, and the times I have called to speak to a sales person always provided the information I needed. Only once did I ask to return an item, and that was easily done.
Been years since I lived in New York City, but their Times Square area store is always on my list when I travel to the city. If only they would open a branch in Houston, TX, which sadly is photography store poor.
I taught photography at the university level for 33 years, and B&H was one of the three stores that was on my supply/equipment list. Put them on yours. I have no connection with B&H, except as a very happy long term customer.
